LocalRxDetection
Performs local Rx score computation on an hyperspectral image.
Hyperspectral
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|in|Input Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|out|Output Image|None|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|ir|Internal radius|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|1|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|er|External radius|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|5|True
